You have time until Monday (February 25) to benefit from three bonuses we‚Äôre currently running: ‚Äî‚ÄäGet 35% back of your first USDX purchase; ‚Äî‚ÄäInvite friends and get 25% back of their first purchase; ‚Äî‚ÄäGet 10% more tokens for your second and all subsequent purchases. Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: We've opened the dedicated buy/sell chat because there were many users who wanted to trade USDX before listing. They've started to make offers in our main chat and we decided to create a separate chat - to make things organized, easier to control and safer. So we've hired escrow agents who help to reduce scam risks. In other words, the initial idea of USDX trading was coming from our community. Reg the low sell price: some people got USDX via Airdrop (for free), so they don't value it enough. Reg USDX backing: the token is collateralized by our core coin - LHT - which will be listed soon.

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: New integration with P2Pb2b and a perfect time to list LHT on Binance  We‚Äôre excited to announce the completion of integration with P2Pb2b (https://p2pb2b.io/) exchange. We‚Äôre listed with LHT/BTC, LHT/ETH and LHT/USD pairs. LHT coin is listed in P2Pb2b cryptocurrency exchange    P2Pb2b exchange was launched in 2014 and significantly updated in 2018; it‚Äôs in Top 20 crypto exchanges according to CoinMarketCap. The platform offers high performance, advanced interface, multicurrency, multi-support and strong safety. P2Pb2b has an official license of the EU and the protection by OWASP TOP10 standard. The exchange has 2K+ users per day; there are referral program and gaming mechanics to keep traders engaged. USDX Wallet team constantly works to provide more trading opportunities for our community and newcomers.    Now, after integration with p2pb2b, it‚Äôs a perfect time to be listed on Binance, right? Let‚Äôs drive this process all together. You can write to Binance support here listing@binance.com. Let‚Äôs show‚Äôem the power of USDX Wallet community! üí™

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: LHT is a core cryptocurrency and collateral for USDX; it has a limited supply of 1B coins. It's based on the exclusive Lighthouse Blockchain. This blockchain is built using tried-and-tested BitShares protocol but operates independently. LHT coin can be quickly and with no fees exchanged to USDX stablecoin via USDX Wallet app. The interconnection between LHT and USDX entails that LHT demand and price rise when the cryptocurrency market goes down. Read more here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/10Ph2AhPHDXsgqXwD1CglRFTVCvxW0SSC/view?usp=sharing

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: Thank you for your questions. The USDX token is backed by LHT coin (collateral); LHT's exchange rate is supported by the demand. Funds raised during our token sale (which will be announced very soon) will help to support an LHT exchange rate when/if needed. So, if LHT will drop, we will have enough funds to support USDX stablecoin. Investors will get up to 35% bonuses (in fact, there are three bonus programs) during the token sale. After a token sale, investors will have an opportunity to buy LHT coins or exchange USDX to LHT and get benefits while LHT exchange rate is growing.

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: TOKEN SALE Announcement  USDX Wallet Token Sale Announcement  We are pleased to announce the token sale for the USDX token, the core stablecoin of USDX payment system. The sale will start on November 1st and close on December 31st. The event is a single campaign with no presale. To participate in the event, you should follow three quick and easy steps:  - Go to https://usdx.cash/tokensale and install a USDX Wallet app  - Register  - Buy USDX.  We're launching the token sale campaign under unique conditions: our product, a USDX Wallet app, is up and running; therefore we're not raising money for the development. Our token sale aims at crypto and FinTech fans, who want to invest in a working project, to be among the early contributors and to buy a stablecoin using our bonus programs. These programs are limited in time, so don't waste yours!

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: USDX token is a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar at a 1:1 ratio via a smart contract. Each token is collateralized with at least 200% worth of LHT, which is our core crypto. A smart contract also controls the supply of a token. LHT coin has a limited supply (1B coins); this is reflected in Lighhouse Block Explorer. LHT coins will be gradually sold on exchanges (from January) and via the USDX Wallet app to prevent extreme volatility. Please refer to our Whitepaper (and Monetary Policy section in particular) for more details: https://drive.google.com/file/d/10Ph2AhPHDXsgqXwD1CglRFTVCvxW0SSC/view

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: The product is ready and working. And yes, token sale result won't have any effect on further product improvements and promotion.

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: Our project uses blockchain technology, based on the core of open-source Graphene/BitShares. This gives us an option to have transactions at lightning speed (100,000 TPS), for example. In terms of security, we apply SSDL and CI/CD. We also use two authorisation mechanisms to guarantee further safety of user data and funds. The first one is a digital signature and the second is 2FA. Please refere to Technologies chapter in our Whitepaper for further details: https://drive.google.com/file/d/10Ph2AhPHDXsgqXwD1CglRFTVCvxW0SSC/view

Author: USDXWallet
Title: [LISTED] USDX Wallet ‚Äî no-fee money transfers in stable crypto
Body: Most of competitors have fees (we're zero-fee for person-to-person transfers), most of them are web-based, not all of them have a working product, they prioritize fiat into crypto conversion. We have: a working product, easy-to-use mobile app, high-speed transactions. Were focusing on crypto transfers. We are not an exchange or a crypto wallet storing multiple cryptos; we offer a payment system for everyone - from a newbie to a crypto pro.
